The study also evaluate efficacy safety RO5185426 . On day 1 , patient receive drug cocktail . On day 6 19 , patient receive RO5185426 twice daily . On day 20 , patient receive RO5185426 drug cocktail day 21 25 , patient receive RO5185426 . Assessments make regular interval dose period follow-up . Patients may continue study treatment ( RO5185426 ) development progressive disease unacceptable toxicity . Target sample size < 50 .
